subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: As the European women defend the Solheim Cup at home, the United States team comes to Germany gunning for a first victory since 2009 in the biennal event the Americans once dominated.
snippet: As the European women defend the Solheim Cup at home, the United States team comes to Germany gunning for a first victory since 2009 in the biennal event the Americans once dominated.
